overview: Beofre you begin training your pet, please understand that every dog is unique and has its own personality.  Some dogs or puppies may take instinctively to the litter box within a couple of days, for others it may take a while longer.  On average, it takes about a week to complete training.  Also be aware there are bound to be accidents during the initial training period.
tagline: No more messes in the house!!
title: Rascal Dog Litter Box
